trans-unit.source: “module”: this directory contains PyNUT.py, which is a Python abstraction class to access NUT server(s). You can use it in Python programs to access NUT’s upsd data server in a simple way, without having to know the NUT protocol.
trans-unit.target: “module”: this directory contains PyNUT.py, which is a Python abstraction class to access NUT server(s). You can use it in Python programs to access NUT’s upsd data server in a simple way, without having to know the NUT protocol.

trans-unit.source: Note: This is an unofficial project, and is in no way supported or endorsed by the Network UPS Tools developers.
trans-unit.target: Note: This is an unofficial project, and is in no way supported or endorsed by the Network UPS Tools developers.

trans-unit.source: A Python abstraction class to access NUT servers.
trans-unit.target: A Python abstraction class to access NUT servers.

trans-unit.target: 예:

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 설치

trans-unit.source: Just use pip:
trans-unit.target: Just use pip:

trans-unit.source: Please note that this module has completely and intentionally broken backwards compatibility with PyNUT 1.X.
trans-unit.target: Please note that this module has completely and intentionally broken backwards compatibility with PyNUT 1.X.

trans-unit.source: PyNUT
trans-unit.target: PyNUT

trans-unit.source: Requirements
trans-unit.target: 요구 사항

trans-unit.source: See inline documentation for more usage information.
trans-unit.target: See inline documentation for more usage information.

trans-unit.source: The following information is copied from the original PyNUT README:
trans-unit.target: The following information is copied from the original PyNUT README:

trans-unit.source: The module itself requires only Python (known to work with versions 2.6 through 3.4). If you wish to run the tests, do
trans-unit.target: The module itself requires only Python (known to work with versions 2.6 through 3.4). If you wish to run the tests, do

trans-unit.source: This directory also contains test_nutclient.py, which is a PyNUT test program. For this to be fully functional, you will need to adapt the login, password and upsname to fit your configuration.
trans-unit.target: This directory also contains test_nutclient.py, which is a PyNUT test program. For this to be fully functional, you will need to adapt the login, password and upsname to fit your configuration.

trans-unit.source: This directory contains various NUT Client related Python scripts, written by David Goncalves, and released under GPL v3.
trans-unit.target: This directory contains various NUT Client related Python scripts, written by David Goncalves, and released under GPL v3.

trans-unit.source: This is an API overhaul of PyNUT, a Python library to allow communication with NUT (Network UPS Tools) servers.
trans-unit.target: This is an API overhaul of PyNUT, a Python library to allow communication with NUT (Network UPS Tools) servers.

trans-unit.source: This module provides a ‘PyNUTClient’ class that can be used to connect and get data from an upsd data server.
trans-unit.target: This module provides a ‘PyNUTClient’ class that can be used to connect and get data from an upsd data server.

trans-unit.source: To import it on Python programs you have to use the following (case sensitive) : ‘import PyNUT’
trans-unit.target: To import it on Python programs you have to use the following (case sensitive) : ‘import PyNUT’

trans-unit.source: To install the PyNUT module on Debian/Ubuntu, copy it to: /usr/share/python-support/python-pynut/
trans-unit.target: To install the PyNUT module on Debian/Ubuntu, copy it to: /usr/share/python-support/python-pynut/

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 용법

trans-unit.source: pip install -rrequirements-testing.txt
trans-unit.target: pip install -rrequirements-testing.txt
